amendment.description: Amendment provides $10 million for Violence Against Women Act programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide an additional $10 million for various new Violence Against Women programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
